paragraph: Call now for a consultation at 858-255-0163

detailsData.title: Skillful Advocacy
detailsData.content: Our attorneys have a combined 70 years of providing successful outcomes in California for our clients involved at all stages of litigation and dispute resolution.

detailsData.title: Strategic Guidance
detailsData.content: We provide strategic guidance to our business clients who range from small, minority-owned, and women-owned businesses, professionals, national, and international Fortune 500 companies.

detailsData.title: Value
detailsData.content: As a small firm, we are able to provide personalized and cost-efficient services to our clients.

address: 10680 Treena Street, Suite 160, San Diego, California 92131
subHeading: Our clients trust us with their important legal concerns
valueProp: Garcia Hong Law APC provides skillful advocacy, strategic guidance, and value to clients in California. Our experienced attorneys offer a personalized approach to legal services.
CTA: Please fill out the form below and one of our attorneys will contact you.

testimonalData.text: Valerie Garcia Hong is at the very top of lawyers. She is prepared and I mean extremely prepared.
testimonalData.author: Client

testimonalData.text: After searching for knowledgeable civil trial attorneys for a real estate dispute, I found Garcia Hong Law.
testimonalData.author: Client

testimonalData.text: It was great working with Valerie to get my complicated case resolved quickly and efficiently.
